bug.author: JakeTheWise
bug.description: looks like the linux tarball for 0.7rc3 accidentally was uploaded as the darwin tarball.

Thanks for the prompt fix! Is this related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/3755>#3755</denchmark-link> ? Wondering if this is happening again? I was trying to showcase Kubeflow at an event over the weekend and could not get the setup to work.

Actually, the latest build 0.7.0. rc.4 works but it has been renamed kfctl-darwin

Line 116 in 2fa8ba7
cd bin && tar -cvzf kfctl_${TAG}_darwin.tar.gz ./kfctl-darwin
